BearerAuth.description: An API key or access token

get.description: Get the current session. If a user is not logged in, this will be null. Otherwise, it will contain the current team and user.

dtCreated.description: The date the user was created

dtConfirmed.description: The date the account was confirmed

publicProfileImageUrl.description: The URL of the team's profile image.

isUserTeam.description: Whether the team is the user's team

dtCreated.description: The date the team was created

team.description: The team the user is a member of

isOwner.description: Whether the user is the owner of the team

isAdmin.description: Whether the user is an admin of the team

teamMemberships.description: The teams this user is a member of

isPhoneVerified.description: Whether the user's phone number has been verified

isPasswordAuthEnabled.description: Whether the user has a password set

isQrCodeBasedMfaEnabled.description: Whether the user has a QR code based MFA enabled

isQrCodeBasedMfaConfirmed.description: Whether the user has a QR code based MFA confirmed

id.description: A unique ID for the user

analyticsId.description: An internal, numeric ID for the user

graphcoreTermsAccepted.description: Whether the user has accepted the Graphcore terms of service

isPrivate.description: Whether the team is private or not

id.description: A unique ID for the team

analyticsId.description: An internal, numeric ID for the team

schema.description: A session object containing the current team and user. If a user is not logged in, this will be null.

get.description: Fetches a list of public IPs.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Fetch the next page of results after this cursor.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to fetch after this page.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Order results by one of these fields.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order to sort the results by.

hasMore.description: Whether there are more pages of results available.

nextPage.description: The cursor required to fetch the next page of results. i.e. `?after=nextPage`. This is `null` when there is no next page.

ip.description: The IP address of the public IP.

region.description: The region of the public IP.

assignedMachineId.description: The ID of the machine the public IP is assigned to.

dtCreated.description: The date the public IP was claimed.

region.description: The region of the public IP.

ip.description: The IP address of the public IP.

region.description: The region of the public IP.

assignedMachineId.description: The ID of the machine the public IP is assigned to.

dtCreated.description: The date the public IP was claimed.

put.description: Assigns a public IP to a machine.

machineId.description: The ID of the machine to assign the public IP to.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: The IP address of the public IP.

ip.description: The IP address of the public IP.

region.description: The region of the public IP.

assignedMachineId.description: The ID of the machine the public IP is assigned to.

dtCreated.description: The date the public IP was claimed.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: The IP address of the public IP.

name.description: The name of the new machine.

machineType.description: The machine type. This must correspond to a machine type label as indicated in List OS templates or List templates.

templateId.description: The template ID. See List OS templates or List templates.

region.description: The region to create the machine in.

autoSnapshotSaveCount.description: The number of auto snapshots to save.

autoShutdownTimeout.description: The auto shutdown timeout in hours.

autoShutdownForce.description: Whether to force shutdown the machine.

takeInitialSnapshot.description: Whether to take an initial snapshot.

restorePointEnabled.description: Whether to use initial snapshot as a restore point.

startOnCreate.description: Whether to start the machine on creation.

accessorIds.description: The IDs of users to grant access to the machine.

name.description: The name of the event, e.g. "create".

state.description: The state of the event, e.g. "done".

machineId.description: The ID of the machine the event is for.

dtCreated.description: The date the event was created.

dtStarted.description: The date the event was started.

dtFinished.description: The date the event was finished.

error.description: The error message of the event, if any.

event.description: The machine event to poll for the async operation.

os.description: The operating system of the machine.

agentType.description: The agent type of the machine.

ram.description: The amount of RAM in bytes.

memory.description: The amount of memory the accelerator has, if applicable.

count.description: The number of accelerators of this type.

privateIp.description: The private IP address of the machine.

networkId.description: The ID of the network the machine is on.

publicIp.description: The public IP address of the machine.

autoSnapshotSaveCount.description: The number of auto snapshots to save.
